Plugin Documentation

Goals available for this plugin:

Goal Description
sca:clean This goal clears out a build ID, potentially for re-use in a subsequent analysis.
sca:cleanUpGeneratedSources Delete all generated Java sources from each project that is marked scanEnabled.
sca:ear Requires SCA 360 v2.5+. Only use with WebLogic.
sca:scan Perform the scan step on a particular build ID. Optionally, upload results to Software Security Center.
sca:translate Translate your application to a particular build ID.
sca:upload Upload result to Software Security Center.

System Requirements

The following specifies the minimum requirements to run this Maven plugin:

Maven 2.0.11
JDK 1.6
Memory No minimum requirement.
Disk Space No minimum requirement.

Usage

You should specify the version in your project's plugin configuration:

<project>
  ...
  <build>
    <!-- To define the plugin version in your parent POM -->
    <pluginManagement>
      <plugins>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>com.fortify.ps.maven.plugin</groupId>
          <artifactId>sca-maven-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>4.20</version>
        </plugin>
        ...
      </plugins>
    </pluginManagement>
    <!-- To use the plugin goals in your POM or parent POM -->
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>com.fortify.ps.maven.plugin</groupId>
        <artifactId>sca-maven-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>4.20</version>
      </plugin>
      ...
    </plugins>
  </build>
  ...
</project>

For more information, see "Guide to Configuring Plug-ins"
